channel.title: oryp6 on Mohammad's blog

item.title: System76 Oryx Pro review
item.description: Intro There are many articles about how good or how bad System76 devices are, many reddit posts about how they are a re-branded clevo laptop and if that is good or evil and I will certainly leave that decision up to you! In this post I’ll try to write about the things I love and hate about Oryx pro. And before you ask, YES there are things I wish I could change about this amazing laptop.
